website_summaries.verdict: Turn your larger dog into the king of the jungle with this environmentally-friendly lion costume.
pros: Costume includes a lion mane with ears and a tail
Fits medium to large dogs 60 to 160 pounds
Made with environmentally-friendly materials that are very breathable
cons: The mane is shorter than the picture suggests
Not machine washable, although you can wash it by hand

customer_reviews.title: This thing is amazing. BUY IT!
customer_reviews.text: This has been my all time favorite amazon purchase thus far. Whoever came up with this is a genius! It arrived quickly and in good condition. It was easy to put on, easy to tighten without harm and it even came with a little tuft for the tail! (my dog only has a nub, so I didn't use that part) The mane bugged her a bit at first, but she got used to it really quickly and soon became the center of attention :) This thing is amazing. BUY IT!
customer_reviews.author: Kenzi

customer_reviews.title: much like a leg warmer
customer_reviews.text: Not what was advertised. I just received a tube with fur, much like a leg warmer, but wider. It didn't have a hood, ears, or tail. It literally was just a rectangle fabric sewn into a cylinder with fur on the outside. Returning this garbage. How many customers do they do this to with the expectation that they won't do anything about it so they can just keep the money? Don't by the Tomsenn one, choose another maker.
customer_reviews.author: Cam

customer_reviews.title: Loved It!
customer_reviews.text: I have never gotten so much attention for a costume before! People across the street came over to check my dog out. So many compliments! I loved the satin liner and the hidden drawstring, plus the coloring fit my dog perfectly. The tail came off a little too easily (with just a tail wag), so I skipped it, but I don't know how you would be able to get something like that to stay on.
customer_reviews.author: Running Queen

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT! A total hit!
customer_reviews.text: This was a total hit when we used it on our greyhound. Stays put very well and didn't bother him at all. The costume gained lots of attention! The tail fluff wouldn't stay on his noodle whip of a tail for anything but it didn't matter. Best and easiest costume ever!
customer_reviews.author: robert swindell

customer_reviews.title: Good quality costume for price
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and it fits my 70 pound boxer/lab mix. It has a drawstring so it would fit a wide range dog sizes. Dropping one star because the tail piece is extremely small and doesn't actually fit on my dog's tail. That was a big part of why I chose this one, but overall I'm happy with the purchase. Seems good enough quality for a costume. Ears are cute. Dog tolerates it. Happy Halloween!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: The Best Lion Mane for BIG Dogs!
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect costume for our 160+ lb Bullmastiff! We have tried several different lion manes, and this is by far the best. The ears make it look so real and the color is perfect! The looks on people's faces?! Priceless!
customer_reviews.author: Heather1567

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Like the idea but get a different one. It didn’t fit her well
customer_reviews.author: Chris M

customer_reviews.title: Lion at heart
customer_reviews.text: I have the comfort a star off because this did tend to slip and slide and the ears would droop. However, my lion was the life of the party. We had so many people stop us and ask us where we got his mane. We also had people lined up to take photos with him. I will say this did get a bit hot in the fun but we are also in Florida. This would be great and colder places. For the most part my lion didn’t have a problem wearing this. I think he forgot at a certain point. The mane did look a little matter but for the price you really can’t beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our Airedale
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our 115 lb Airedale Terrier’s Halloween costume. It was well made, and looked great! I brushed it against the grain to get the fur to stand up, it shed a bit. The tail didn’t fit his nub (the tail barely fit in my pinky finger FYI). Our dogs neck is pretty thick / long, and it didn’t sit as low as it did on other dogs. Lastly, wren the dog puts its head down it falls off - maybe secure w/ hair binder to collar or the end of drawstring to keep it from falling off.
customer_reviews.author: The Gustafson’s

customer_reviews.title: She  hated every second of it - and it was just too cute!
customer_reviews.text: I needed to dress my dog up as a lion for a work project (don't ask...). She is a 70 lb pit bull. The only way I got her to accept the wig was after 45 minutes of playing ball until she was tired - and then we kept playing to show her it was safe - took a million pictures - this is my favorite. This may be the most amusing purchase I've ever made for under 20 bucks. The quality is fine for a cheap costume/prop. The tail piece didn't really work - it fell right off and I didn't want to push it, so I photoshopped the tail on for the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Panther

customer_reviews.title: Great coloring and simple to put on
customer_reviews.text: This is the cutest lion mane! I was wanting a mane that didn’t have cheesy colored fur, and this didn’t disappoint. Great colors and one of the more “authentic” looking mane costumes (in my opinion). Putting it on was extremely easy, also. The hole is large, and there’s a drawstring to tighten the mane around the face. My dog didn’t mind it at first, but eventually he did get annoyed that there was something on his head. I don’t think he was uncomfortable, though.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney Roberts

customer_reviews.title: It really fits med to large.
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase. It wasn’t to big. I have a pit bull so he isn’t really a large dog but more medium large. So this came out perfect. It matched his coat and because you don’t have to force their ears out of any holes, he didn’t mind wearing like some other pet headgear.
customer_reviews.author: JVENOM1

customer_reviews.title: Not good for really large dogs
customer_reviews.text: not a great size for a bull mastiff once it is at maximum size there is no stretch at all I could put it on but it was skin tight and it choked him we couldn't leave it on but for a second for pictures absolutely adorable and would work for a smaller dog just to put things into perspective Diesel is a bull mastiff and he weighs about 150 lb if your dog is similar to diesel size you may want to think of something else
customer_reviews.author: Summer S.

customer_reviews.title: A guaranteed Adorable Way to make everyone smile!
customer_reviews.text: This lions mane is so fun. We put it on our lab just for a smile one day. You can’t help but light up the whole room when your dog trots in with this on. It’s a great crowd pleaser with young and old. I’d love to see someone use it on their therapy dog they bring in to hospitals. Kids would love it! Has a drawstring on it so you can adjust the fit a bit. Tried it out on my smaller dog too and it still (kinda) worked)
customer_reviews.author: Katie Jo Artsy

customer_reviews.title: Over all I'm very happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as my dog's halloween costume and it looked great! It is adjustable at the head so it stays put even when our dog was running around the yard playing fetch. It looks great on him and I'm very happy with the quality of this purchase. The only thing I wish It had was a way to attach it to his collar so the base of the mane didn't ride up his face when he lowers his nose toward the ground. This is not an issue to play dress up but he could knock it off when he was picking up a tennis ball playing fetch.
customer_reviews.author: Garris Barton

customer_reviews.title: Winner of Halloween Costume Contest
customer_reviews.text: When you have a 110 lb German Shepard/Yellow Lab mix who already looks like Bear, it was an easy transition to fearless Lion with this mane. It matched his fur almost perfectly and he didn't mind wearing too much for short periods of time. Not something you would leave on for any extended period of time due to it covering his ears and probably being pretty warm. Ironically, my dogs name is in fact "Bear" so on this day he was Lion-Bear.
customer_reviews.author: BMUR

customer_reviews.title: Fantasic!
customer_reviews.text: We love this mane. My Golden looks great in it, people just go nuts. Since he’s a total ham, he lives it too. I was caught off guard when I had to pick it up from the post office because it was international, but it was worth it, and a great deal to boot!
customer_reviews.author: MikeysMom

customer_reviews.title: Does not look like the photo!
customer_reviews.text: This fit my 80 lb dog but the hair was scraggly and thin and did not look like the photo. Very disappointed 😕
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Mostoller

customer_reviews.title: Cuteness overload
customer_reviews.text: Mane is good with a liner on the inside and an elastic band with tightener. My bulldog absolutely hates wearing this, but he looks freakin adorable.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Marvin gives it 5 Barks on a 5 Bark scale.
customer_reviews.text: Well I bought this for Marvin, my yellow lab. His first one got lost, but I was really surprised by how many people stopped to make sure he wasn't a Lion! Pretty funny actually. For the money you can't beat it. On a scale of 5 barks Marvin gives it 5, but Burley his black lab brother only 1 because I would not let him wear it. LOL He had his own costume. Love your dogs, your their entire world! Bobby, Marvin and Burley!
customer_reviews.author: Angus

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute!
customer_reviews.text: I work in a veterinary clinic and I actually ordered this costume for a co-workers dog, but if course I had to try it on my 48# English Bulldog when it came in. Fit nicely and it must've been really comfortable because he was walking around for at least 15 minutes without trying to take it off. The only reason it came off was because I didnt have it tightened all the way, so when he shook his head it flew off. I would definitely recommend this costume for any dog.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Tail piece didn’t work for us, but over all cute idea
customer_reviews.text: The idea of this is very cute! It’s a very odd fit though and I can’t really see how the tail piece would work at all. The opening is soooooo tiny and doesn’t adjust. We put the head piece on our baby and had a good laugh. It only lasted second, but that part is because our dog didn’t like it. :p I’m not disappointed In The product, just know that the tail piece was kind of pointless. Maybe if another dog was used to being dressed up they would get better use out of the head piece.
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than expected needs some adjusting to work, but good overall
customer_reviews.text: We have a 40-something-pound cocker spaniel mix. He's actually over 50 because he's fat, but I'd say he's a medium-sized dog pretty handily. This is pretty big on him. Thankfully, the strings on it will pull tight and he's adorable, it's just a bit too long and we have to "scrunch" it. The inner lining also has a tendency to roll outwards. It takes a few minutes to get it just right, and the ears lay flat instead of standing up. But, once it's on and adjusted and we've gotten the ears to temporarily stand up? IT LOOKS AWESOME!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nada Chance

customer_reviews.title: the most fun you will have with your dog
customer_reviews.text: I bought this purely for fun. My dog did not need this but he sure looks good wearing it. It is a good quality "prop" and I had a lot of fun taking my dog on photoshoots wearing this . My dog is black but this main which includes some black hairs amongst the brown looked incredibly good against his black fur.
customer_reviews.author: Green Tree

customer_reviews.title: Made a GoldenLion
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our Golden Retriever. He absolutely rocked it! It only uses a drawstring to hold it on so if your dog wants it off its no problem for them. Mine had no problem wearing it. Now the tail attachment he wanted nothing to do with. The only negative thing is that the ears lay flat if they would stick up a bit would look a little nicer.
customer_reviews.author: Dcems Paramedic

customer_reviews.title: OMG HILARIOUS!!!
customer_reviews.text: My boy loves to dress up for Halloween, so we dress him up all Halloween week long in his wardrobe of costumes. The Lion Mane was this year's new addition. While it was not his all-time favorite to wear, everyone who saw him, including people on the street, were delighted and sometimes amazed that a lion was allowed to walk on the streets of NYC! The tail piece did not fit his chubby tail -- but not a problem at all. Love this lion mane!!!
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t stay on - too big for a medium size dog
customer_reviews.text: This mane is really big for my 65 pound yellow lab. It has a drawstring, but it keeps moving around and she can get it off easily. In fact, my other dog keeps taking it off her so she can carry it around like a baby. It might work if you have a larger dog maybe. It does look super cute.
customer_reviews.author: Easter Clan

customer_reviews.title: So funny
customer_reviews.text: Dog didn't hate it as much as I expected and she looks hilarious with it on. Would be nice if there was also a string in the back to ensure that it stays tight. The tail attachment also immediately flew off because it just slides onto the tail and there's nothing actually keeping it in place. Overall though it looks good and to my surprise it didn't have any offensive smells right out of the package.
customer_reviews.author: Yax

customer_reviews.title: Immeasurably Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: The item is very well made with quality materials and craftsmanship. Not that a halloween costume begs for that, mind you. But in this case it makes for a comfier dog. The hood is satin lined with a draw-elastic cord. It features super long plush faux fur (when you brush it out against the grain - it becomes a huge poofy mane!) and adorable realistic plush ears. Super affordable, so don't hesitate! Sadly, I have no more dogs of my own, but I dressed up my neighbor's adorable golden with it as a surprise!
customer_reviews.author: M. SpaldingTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: We put this on our 5 yr old lab/retriever mix for Halloween and was so darn cute. The tail didn't stay on but the man was adorable. We received so many compliments on it and more compliments than on our 2 daughters dressed up for Halloween. We will decently be putting this on her every Halloween.
customer_reviews.author: mommy of 2 from WI

customer_reviews.title: Hilarious Halloween costume!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my golden retriever for Halloween. We have several new neighbors with small children and thought they would enjoy seeing our dog dress up as a lion. I didn’t expect how much I loved it. It was hilarious and made all the family laugh. This lions mane was much nicer than I expected. Even the resealable storage bag was nice. It’s worth the price for all the laughter.
customer_reviews.author: skihut

customer_reviews.title: Its cute but matted
customer_reviews.text: Its matted as heck, but I think most costume items do that. Bonus: it comes with a tail which I didn't see when purchasing. It doesn't work on my dogs tail because she is a shiba lol It doesn't look exactly like the picture but close enough. Once we figured out how to get it on the dog it was adorable on my pup.
customer_reviews.author: Kody Robison

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what you want
customer_reviews.text: Perfect product. We got this for game day to root for the Detroit Lions (lol) Our dog doesn’t hate it (too much) — she doesn’t even mind it if it isn’t covering her ears! It goes perfectly with her coloring. Very cute. The tail piece was useless though, her tail is too thick for it to go on.
customer_reviews.author: elle

customer_reviews.title: How can we say "No" to such a sweet boy? This thing fits him very well
customer_reviews.text: Our Teddy Bear wants to be a Lion for Halloween... How can we say "No" to such a sweet boy? This thing fits him very well. He doesn't like it a bit, but we do. And so does everyone else! Worth the money. (He does like it on his Mom, though!)
customer_reviews.author: A. Teddy Bear

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: The headpiece is adjustable and is not tight at all so my dog was comfortable. The tail peice was tight we didn’t bother trying to put it on her. She didn’t seem too thrilled about wearing this but she let us leave it on her. This was great for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: Just ok.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my Bullmastiff who has a thick neck and shoulders. (135 lbs) I read reviews that said this should fit, and while it does fit, it is too long and narrow and it bunches up and goes over his face --even with the toggle adjusted. If he doesn't move, it's fine. But he moves. After one wear, for 10 minutes, one of the ears fell off. This might be better for a lab or a dog with a longer neck and less broad shoulders.
customer_reviews.author: Thami64

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect "costume" for our 100lb dog. The kids loved and and some even questioned whether we had a real lion. It stayed on him as he ran around the house and to the door. Once he got used to it (we don't dress him) it didn't seem to bother him. Will keep this around for re-use in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Luke A.

customer_reviews.title: So Cute!
customer_reviews.text: This product is pretty fantastic! I love how it fit snuggly on my dog’s head with the adjustable strap. It looks so cute on him. The color is a little too red, but it’s hardly noticeable. The tail piece would not stay on, but I love the mane. This was a great purchase; I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Of course it went on a Goldie...
customer_reviews.text: Of course it went on a Golden...for Halloween. We have a dutch door so keep the top open for "receiving" the kids. Well, Our Goldie has learned to put his feet on the lower door to lean out looking for kids coming up the walkway. Kids loved it/Apollo loved it and I was happy for both.
customer_reviews.author: VIP - a Customer!

customer_reviews.title: This is adorable!
customer_reviews.text: I have a medium size dog and I am not sure if I will keep this product. He has a smaller head and the lions ears don't really show. The tail actually stays on his knobby tail quite well. I will have to see if my husband loves it or hates it. This costume works best perhaps on larger breeds like Shepards, labs, or Golden retriever.
customer_reviews.author: LaineTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: nope
customer_reviews.text: I had to return this because it wouldn't stay on my dog. I wasn't a fan of the construction and the tail accessory was entirely pointless for any living dog.
customer_reviews.author: Buckeye_gal4

customer_reviews.title: Fits a human great too!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a lions mane for my 7 year old for a school play and this was the best priced thing I could find. It did the trick. I folded it under a bit around the face so that the ears would be placed in the correct spot. It would fit an adult too if you’re looking for a costume mane.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: So cute. Perfect for my doggo. As a family, we were themed for halloween this year and my boy looked so cute at the cowardly lion. The front portion of the mane has a cord so it can be adjusted. We found that the tail piece didn't stay on too well as my dogs tail tapers a lot at the end so it would fly off once he would start wagging his tail.
customer_reviews.author: Vy Pham

customer_reviews.title: Iconic
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how impressed my dog was, but she tolerated it well and I love it. Earned compliments and lots of laughs from trick or treaters.
customer_reviews.author: Opinion Fatigue

customer_reviews.title: Put this on your pet and there will be a lot of laughs.
customer_reviews.text: Had the relatives over and put this on our Australian Shepherd. We all were cracking up laughing and husband started playing lion tamer with the dog and calling him Simba. Dog got so excited he started running in and out of the rooms like a crazy animal - all the time with the lion mane on. Hysterical.
customer_reviews.author: butterchern

customer_reviews.title: It's okay for the price, not accurate fit for tail piece
customer_reviews.text: The actual fit of the costume around the head is good! It's easy to put in and the strap at the bottom works fine to adjust. The extra tail piece is so small that I cannot use it. They say for large dogs but no way to fit the tail piece on any large or medium sized dog. this is unfortunate because the tail completes the costume.
customer_reviews.author: Angelique M

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and cute!
customer_reviews.text: Adorable and comfy! Don't force animal to wear it if your pet is not used to wearing costumes. Use treats and patience to help your fur baby ease into one. Tail is hard to attach, as there are no velcro or button to secure it. Flies away easily when your dog starts wagging.
customer_reviews.author: JuneClover

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: It was perfect! I have an extra large labrador l and it's hard finding things that fit him right. This was the perfect fit and he didn't mind wearing it at all. The tail piece was a little right- I was so busy laughing at my dogs cuteness I didn't even bother putting it on. The bag it comes in is nice too, easy to store.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Arrived already broken and unusable.
customer_reviews.text: The push button ball latch on the adjustable string was smashed when I received mine so it was no longer adjustable which kind of defeats the purpose and makes it unusable. Sad it was delivered like that. I'm keeping it because I think I can find a replacement one somewhere but giving a 1 star because how could you send a broken product out to a first time buyer?
customer_reviews.author: David price

customer_reviews.title: Adorable lions mane!
customer_reviews.text: It's a very adorable lions mane. We bought it for our beagle, Jack, to wear for a Halloween picture. He looks adorable. He only wore it for 10 minutes which was fine with us. We just wanted a family picture. It fit him perfectly with room for adjustment. Thank you for great product.
customer_reviews.author: J. Krzyna-RaspetTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: One dog HATES it lol but it looks terrific! Came with a tail tuft... no idea how u would even attach, it became a cat toy :) Fairly comfortable for the pooches, their ears are covered so they don't care for it much, but worked great for greeting trick or treaters.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My dog actually loves his lion mask!
customer_reviews.text: The mane was easy to put on and my dog somehow allows it. The tale portion is supposed to go on the end of his tail and there was no way that was happening but that's ok. Everyone loves him in his lion's mane and he really seems to like it. This will be our go-to Halloween costume forever.
customer_reviews.author: SJSlo

customer_reviews.title: So Cute
customer_reviews.text: This is so very cute! Sadly, I have the hardest time getting it to stay on my golden retriever, who hates wearing any time of head decorations, and it's too small to fit on my bernese mountain dog, who LOVES CLOTHES but is often just too big for them.
customer_reviews.author: K'lyn

customer_reviews.title: Funny!
customer_reviews.text: Money well spent for this picture! Hahaha! I can’t get the dog to settle down long enough to adjust the size on it, so it slides off. Remember when you were a kid and your Mom made you wear matching itchy sweaters for pictures? Yea, she was THAT anxious to get out of this thing! Great item for a funny picture.
customer_reviews.author: skeetermonkeymom

customer_reviews.title: Looks so cute
customer_reviews.text: So as I was clicking the comfort as 5 stars I thought maybe the dog might not agree, but I left it anyway. It is so cute on all of the dogs we have put it on, the Lab, the Redbone Coon Hound, the Great Dane, the German Shepard, and a couple of mutts.
customer_reviews.author: DLHD

customer_reviews.title: I got something completely different than what is pictured.
customer_reviews.text: What I got isn't even the same product that is listed. There are no ears on the mane. There was no tail included as a "free gift". All there is is the furry fabric. I am returning this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Thompson

customer_reviews.title: So life-like! Buy it! Hilarious!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best thing I've ever bought. The tail piece is worthless but the mane is so good and so real I don't even care. My dog is 115 pounds so it's so hard to find costumes for her. She scared the daylights out of multiple people on Halloween who thought she was a real lion for a second!
customer_reviews.author: Buhnanna

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely adorable and worked so well for our Bella to be the cowardly lion to go with our daughters wizard of oz costume. Got here super quick. The tail piece is so cute too but comes right off as soon as our doggy wags her tail. Mane fit well and synches to tighten around head
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Who wore it better? 😂
customer_reviews.text: My dog didn’t care too much for it, so I used it too, just for fun! We both made some fun TikToks! I think it’s a great value for the money! Definitely meant to fit a dogs head more than a humans, but I love that I made it work. I keep putting it on him so he’ll get used to it. He might be warming up...
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah Vega

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great costume, people loved it! My dog-not so much! Lol. It seemed to move around a lot on his big head even though we adjusted it several times...but he looked so realistic in it that it actually scare a few small kids...great Halloween!
customer_reviews.author: Jlynne

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: The lion mane is a lot of fun, we got a lot of comments as it is exactly the color our golden mix is. We loved it, my dog... no so much haha. He does okay with bandanas around her neck, but something that goes in front of her ears like this she does not. But going trick or treating, she had far too much other things to be interested in to try to take it off.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn B. Minter

customer_reviews.title: IT'S AWESOME!!
customer_reviews.text: This costume is AWESOME!! We have a 50lb(ish) blue nose pitt and it fits her and it is so freaking cute!! And she is matching the theme of our own halloween costumes.. a killer clown and a sinister ringmaster.. it has had a slide adjuster for the part that goes around her face so it's not elastic and I actually like that better than elastic so there no worry about any part of it being uncomfortable for her.. I ordered it yesterday afternoon and it was here in less than 24 hours!! Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: P. Gilliam

customer_reviews.title: ROOOAAAR
customer_reviews.text: I have a German Shepherd mix. The mixed color hair almost exactly matched his coat 😂😂😂the time spent laughing and trying to get his fat head in that thing was totally worth it. It’s adjustable to dog size. It has a drawstring like cord inside the mane that helps keep them from shaking it off 😂😂😂
customer_reviews.author: Sarah O.

customer_reviews.title: Lion costume for large dog
customer_reviews.text: Was a 'hit' on Halloween. Picture shows 'Keeper' patiently waiting to scare kids on Halloween😀
customer_reviews.author: Bean

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it
customer_reviews.text: Big and fluffy. Looked great on my 75-lb. red merle Am Staff. There was no way the tail puff was going to stay on. I put a little safety pin and ribbon on the back of the mane, and attached it to his harness. It stayed on and he didn't mind wearing it at Halloween party. Behold, the toothless lion!
customer_reviews.author: Grace D.

customer_reviews.title: The Lion King
customer_reviews.text: My yellow Labrador Retriever works as a volunteer Therapy Dog. He went for a visit as the Lion King yesterday. Smiles and giggles spread quickly around the room. Who needs to wait for Halloween. I ordered the medium to large size and it fit him perfectly with a little adjusting on the draw string. Tail piece is a little tight but in his case... he really doesn't need it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Tiger King
customer_reviews.text: @Finley_TheAus helped complete our Tiger King costume with his lions mane. It was a little long for him, 50lb Aussie, but it made the mane fuller looking. He did not keep it on very long but it was awesome for pictures!
customer_reviews.author: @Finley_theaus

customer_reviews.title: adorable pitbull lion
customer_reviews.text: I have an 86 pound senior rescued pittie with copper colored lion eyes and red coloring and this matched his coat exactly. only complaint, the top with the little ears constantly twirls around to under his chin, adding a little strap would make a big difference. I'll add a pic soon.
customer_reviews.author: zippity do dog

customer_reviews.title: Pure joy and laughter
customer_reviews.text: Hahahaha Hahahaha!!!! My dog has become the lion from the Wizard of Oz.....still looking for her courage (and now dignity). The wig fits her color perfectly, but bc my baby girl has such a small head, the wig is a little loose. It’s pretty good quality. There’s lining on the inside to make it more comfy for the dog. The lion tail was a bit too small for her, but I feel like she’s okay with that.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Vo

customer_reviews.title: No tail included in mine
customer_reviews.text: This is very cute and easy to put on. I have a 2 year old Great Dane and it adjusts to fit her. I would have given a higher rating but I didn't receive a tail tuft! Pictures and reviews said it came with one, which is why I ordered this one. Overall it's a cute item and I'm satisfied just a little disappointed I didn't receive all that I thought I was ordering.
customer_reviews.author: ajblue

customer_reviews.title: Grrrrr!
customer_reviews.text: Wish there were a photo option here. My hound looked adorable as a lion for Halloween. She wouldn’t have kept it on except I looped her leash around the mane. Worked great. She kept it on for 45 minutes!
customer_reviews.author: Sue E

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This costume is very nice except one thing which is why I gave 4 stars. I wish there was a draw string at the back of it too so my dog wasn't able to pull it off so easily. Or something that could attach to the back 2 legs or tail so they can't get it off. If they paw it at all it just comes off. But the quality is great and it looks awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy D. Marcoux

customer_reviews.title: You’re Gonna RAWR!!
customer_reviews.text: Introducing the cutest, cuddliest lion! The costume worked well on my lab (the piece for her tail was useless) but the headpiece stayed on. You could easily tighten the headpiece and my dog could not easily push it off. Everyone wanted to pet our “lion.” Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Greg and Diane!

customer_reviews.title: Cute lion mane but it can be tough to get it to stay on the dog
customer_reviews.text: this can be a little difficult to get it to stay on your dog, depending on how calm the dog is. In the 20sec it stayed on my dog it was the cutest and coolest thing I’ve ever seen. It is a great product and I highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Steve Mullikin

customer_reviews.title: Cheapish but works
customer_reviews.text: It is a mane and does look funny for a costume. I was gonna make her the cowardly lion in our Wizard of Oz trio. However the little plastic piece to snug up the string was busted so it wouldn't stay on. Returned. Maybe for next year!
customer_reviews.author: Aly Kate

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Without a doubt the best $13 I have spent on anything in a looooong time! I never write reviews, but this product deserves one. It looks great, has the ability to be tightened so it's not constantly slipping off. Even includes the tail poof. I honestly would have expected to pay much more for something this awesome. My dog is 100lb yellow lab, so definitely for a larger breed dog, but I am so happy with this product. Definitely recommend to anyone wanting to transform their pooch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS THE BEST! It looks so funny and cute
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS THE BEST! It looks so funny and cute, and it stays on pretty well. It has an elastic cord to cinch up to tighten it. My dog doesn't even notice its there, and my kids think it's hilarious. Also they send you a little puff for their tail! Solid gold. :)
customer_reviews.author: ashleysara

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: I had to bribe my dog with treats to get a picture of him wearing it. It’s so funny! I wish he would leave it on! It’s good quality for a costume, but not sure how they expect the tail to be put on. He wasn’t interested in wearing the tail either.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great costume.
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! My dog tolerated it. She seemed to be uncomfortable wearing it but she wore it anyway. I didn’t like how much it slid down her head. You’d have to make it really tight to keep it on right. Not comfortable for my dog but my husband and I enjoyed dressing her up. Lots of compliments so if you have an aggressive dog I wouldn’t recommend because of how many people approach you and want to pet your dog.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Could be a 5 star if it stayed on.
customer_reviews.text: Reason for 4 stars is, it does not stay on very long regardless How many times I tighten it or tighten the string. My French mastiff looked super cute on this but I can tell it’s not comfortable and he gets hot with it on. Overall cute product, he definitely looks like a mini lion with it on. And it actually fits his big head
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality- used for humans too
customer_reviews.text: Nice thick fur, beautiful colors, lined. Draw string for adjusting. We used this for an adult actor’s lion costume. Fit great. We unstitched the seam to be able to pull it down lower on the shoulder. Picture shows mane plus the lion full mask (most of mask front cut out)
customer_reviews.author: kj324

customer_reviews.title: Great, simple costume
customer_reviews.text: Our chocolate lab was able to sustain wearing this mane for more than 5 seconds— only after some coaching, of course. The package also comes with a little ring of fur to put on the end of the tail, but we didn’t even attempt it, as he already has helicopter tail. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina

customer_reviews.title: Bulldog lion mane
customer_reviews.text: Fit 75 lb olde English bulldog with 20” neck. Needs to be tightened with the fastener as it slides over his face, but that is a bulldog issue not a manufacturing issue
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My FUR LION!!
customer_reviews.text: This is super cute and I love it!! When I walk my dog around the block I tend to startle people at first lol!! Fits great and the adjustable strap works great makes it easy to put on and off! The tail is easy to get on also. My dog is still a puppy so it is a little big but the strap I can adjust it and it fits fine. She will get a lot bigger I can not wait till Halloween she will be dressed to the T!! The fabric is soft and will not irritate your pups skin. The strap is adjustable so no worries on a chocking! It is just an all around great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Shopping addict!!

customer_reviews.title: Pitbullion! Great!
customer_reviews.text: Tge colour is perfect, size is adjustable as hood. Aers look pretty, surprisingly. The tail end was too tine to put on my dog’s tail, but she looks like a lion even without it! A pitbullion! Lol!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sneaking into the zoo.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great! The dog does not hate it but I took one star off because my dog has a stubby tail and cannot use the little tail-end attachment. I cannot believe we are still tail-shaming in 2019, some of our best friends are Labs, but still, it hurts.
customer_reviews.author: irooster

customer_reviews.title: Super Great Product.
customer_reviews.text: My lab looks so handsome in his lion mane! He is not sure how he feels about it, but I LOVE it! The tail flies off whenever he wags his tail. Only thing I don't love.
customer_reviews.author: Becksters

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: once I put this all my girl I couldn't stop laughing, good quality, worth every penny!!! My bullmastiff-lion,you won't be dissatisfied, won first place at our vet's Halloween costume party!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ron &Dana

customer_reviews.title: My dog won the costume contest wearing this
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 1 year old golden retriever and it fit well. The lining is a slippery satin and only has one tightening strap in the front to hold it in place so it kept falling off my dog. But other than that it looked great and my dog ended up winning first place in the costume contest at his vet so it was definitely worth the money for me.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Great looking product, just one problem....
customer_reviews.text: This product looks great and got tons of laughs from people when our greyhound had it on. I would give it 5 stars if the lion's mane didn't stink so bad after I opened the bag! It wasn't just ordinary factory smell, it absolutely STUNK and the smell transferred to my hands and my dog's head. We were able to wash it by hand to make it smell pretty good but before we did that.....GUHHHHH! Anyways, don't let that stop you from buying it - just be aware.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits even the largest dogs
customer_reviews.text: We have an English Mastiff, I wasn't sure this would fit her, but it does. The mane is perfect and stretches to accommodate extra large dogs (giant even). However, the tail tuft doesn't really work. It flies off when she wags the tail but the mane is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Thom

customer_reviews.title: Good quality--but not good for big, shaggy dogs.
customer_reviews.text: We have a 75 pound Goldendoodle and the mane is way too short. The "wig" is tubular and slid easily over his head, but the "fur" was clearly too short for our dog. It just made him look a little shaggier--but nothing like the mane on the dog in the advertisement picture. I must say, however, that it seems to be made of quality materials for the price. Perhaps a different "model" with longer fur might be what's needed for bigger dogs with longer fur. We will be returning it; the return process looks like it will be fairly painless.
customer_reviews.author: DunbartonDave

customer_reviews.title: So Cute!!
customer_reviews.text: Got stopped every 5' when I put this on my grandpuppers, Teddy, to walk him! The drawstring closure could've definitely had a little padding, so when you tighten it well enough to stay put, it doesn't irritate their neck.
customer_reviews.author: Jay M.  & Jen P.

customer_reviews.title: So adorable! Got so many compliments
customer_reviews.text: This costume was such a hit on Halloween!! Fit my goldie perfectly. He shook it off a couple times but we just kept putting it on and nearly every person that walked by him commented on how cute it was! 100% having him wear it next year! So so cute!
customer_reviews.author: A. Brostrom

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome! This fit our large dog perfectly. He seemed comfortable in it too he didn't try to take it off as much as we thought he would. The tail did not go on right & definitely would not stay for more than 1 second. But it was totally worth it even without the tail.
customer_reviews.author: AmazingGrays

customer_reviews.title: tricks and treats
customer_reviews.text: So cute and we had a good laugh. The manes come with a tail poof and I could not figure out how to get those on but I dont think those would stay on long anyway. The mane comes with a cinch clip to adjust.
customer_reviews.author: NurseLo

customer_reviews.title: Years to use with pull String front
customer_reviews.text: Great value for money and accurately described. It has a pull string in front that can fit small to larger dog; so many years of use.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Brown

customer_reviews.title: Definitely made for bigger dogs, but also looks great on people!
customer_reviews.text: I have a pug, so this was a little too large for him, but it still looks pretty great on him. It also fits me, and is definitely going to be my Halloween costume this year. Everyone says pictures, or it didnt happen, so enjoy the picture below. I would definitely recommend this for a larger dog though, something like the stock advertisement picture. Also, the bonus tail attachment was really hard to put on my pug's (Simba) curly little tail hahahah. Overall its really cool!
customer_reviews.author: Vivek D

customer_reviews.title: Fun lion mane for my German shepherd
customer_reviews.text: My dogs German shepherd ears didn't like to be squashed down so he preferred it behind his ears. He thinks he's pretty handsome with it on. Lots of fun and a great price!
customer_reviews.author: zippymlh

customer_reviews.title: Won't stay on my dog.  :(
customer_reviews.text: It's basically a big furry tube with sewn on ears and a drawstring at one end. Too bad. It would've been super cute as a costume, but my pup just tips his head down and it falls off.
customer_reviews.author: minibus

product_meta.title: TOMSENN Dog Lion Mane - Realistic & Funny Lion Mane for Dogs - Complementary Lion Mane for Dog Costumes - Lion Wig for Medium to Large Sized Dogs Lion Mane Wig for Dogs
product_meta.description:
Pattern Name:BrownWhen it comes to buying gifts for their pet dogs, all dog owners find themselves in a fix – there simply aren’t any good options to choose from! But that was until now – because now you have a perfectly cute & amazingly useful item that just makes total sense – Tomsenn Dog Lion Mane!

It’s a One-Mane-Show!
Taking your dog out to a cosplay party? How about Halloween get-togethers? Want your dog to impress onlookers & judges at a dog show?
Well, it’s your pet dog’s big day, and you want to do everything in your power to make it better, don’t you? That’s exactly when a dog lion mane like this comes incredibly handy. In an instant, you can turn your cute dog into an impressive, full-maned lion.

For a Perfect Fit
We manufacture these dog lion wigs as complements for dog costumes. A perfect fit for medium for large sized dogs is what we aim for, and that’s exactly what you get. This dog lion mane is suitable for neck sizes that range from 60 cm to 80 cm.It’s also very easy to put on & take off your dog.

No-hassle Cleaning
Tomsenn products are known for their utility oriented design & high-quality materials. This dog lion mane is no exception. We use wool fibre to make sure that our lion mane is as realistic-looking as it can get. It doesn’t cause any discomfort or irritation to your pet & is easy to clean.

Think outside the box& get your pet dog a lion mane as a gift, just how thousands of happy dog owners already have. Take our word for it, all the fun that is to follow will be worth it. Click ‘Add to Cart’ to order right away!
feature_bullets: IT’S TIME TO ROAR – Tomsenn Dog Lion Mane is the most realistic & best-fitting lion mane for dogs – Turn your lovely pooch into a funnily ferocious King of the Jungle in a jiffy
EASY TO CLEAN& DURABLE – At Tomsenn, we make sure that every dog lion wig we sell is made from high-quality Polyester fiber that are sure to last long – This dog lion mane is woolen&easy to clean

A PERFECT COMPLEMENT FOR DOG COSTUMES – Whether it’s Halloween, dog shows, local carnivals or cosplay parties, with this dog lion wig, your pet dog will always be set to be the eye-catcher of the event
FOR MEDIUM TO LARGE SIZED DOGS – This lion mane from Tomsenn is designed to fit perfectly for medium to large sized dogs – Compatible neck size for dogs ranges from 60 cm to 80 cm

MAKES FOR A GREAT CHRISTMAS GIFT – If you’re wondering what you can get your beloved pet dog for this Holiday Season, this is where your search ends – Wait no longer, click ‘Add to Cart’ to order today
